docs.title: km2miles
docs.text: km2miles is a simple Python package for converting kilometers to miles.

docs.title: Features
docs.text:
• Lightweight and easy to use
  • Precision up to 6 decimal places
  • Well-tested and documented

Check out the Installation and Usage guides.

docs.title: km_to_miles(km: float) -> float
docs.text:
Converts kilometers to miles.

Example:

from km2miles import km_to_miles
print(km_to_miles(5))  # Output: 3.106855

docs.title: Usage
docs.text:
Import and use km_to_miles:

from km2miles import km_to_miles

print(km_to_miles(10))  # Output: 6.21371
